9091.name: Shield of Absorption
9091.description: Create a dome around you that pushes foes back and absorbs projectiles.

facts.description: Recently struck by <c=@abilitytype>Banish</c>. <c=@abilitytype>Mighty Blow</c> will consume this effect to teleport to the target.

(Defiant foes will have their defiant bar reduced instead.)

30359.name: Gravity Well
